newsitem.title: JAPAN: Sumitomo Bank to post 119.2 bln yen appraisal loss.
newsitem.headline: Sumitomo Bank to post 119.2 bln yen appraisal loss.

text.p: Sumitomo Bank Ltd said on Thursday that it would post a 119.2 billion yen appraisal loss on securities holdings in its results for fiscal 1996/97.
As a result of the loss, the bank revised downward its earnings forecast for the year to March 31, 1997.

It said it now expects a parent operating profit of 50 billion yen, down from a previous forecast of 80 billion yen. It also revised down its parent net profit forecast to 35 billion yen from 60 billion.
